name: Noobtuts Arkanoid clone
description: If you follow this tutorial from noobtuts.com you get this Arkanoid clone.  Theres one thing you need to do different for it to work though: in the tutorial it says to make the collider on the blocks a size of 0.16x.08 but it should be 16x8.  That fixed everything for me anyway I hope it works for you.
